summary: This bill, the Healthy Start Reauthorization Act of 2025 (H.R. 3302), seeks to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Healthy Start Initiative. The bill reauthorizes funding for the initiative, allocating $145,000,000 for each fiscal year from 2026 to 2030.  It was introduced in the House of Representatives by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez and Ms. Malliotakis and referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
